message:
Support for ttd value 0 in TimeUntilDisconnectNotification.

For the MQTT adapter an unsubcription to the command topic will emit
a ttd value of 0 that signals that the device is not available anymore.
This should not be confused with the connection event that is emitted after the
connection was established.

Signed-off-by: Karsten Frank <Karsten.Frank@bosch-si.com>
